rules_text: {3}, {T}: Conscript a Rebel. [i](Look at the top four cards of your library. Reveal a Rebel from them and put it into your hand or create a 1/1 Rebel token. Put the rest on the bottom.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“One day my face will live among our ancestors here. I hope by that day this will be our capital, and no longer an outpost forsaken by royalty.”
—Lord Mpumo[/i]
